title: Capricorn charter
creator_credit: Frank Killian, Queensland Government Tourist Bureau and Movietone Productions
brief_description: Shows the tourist features of the central coast of Queensland, with scenes around Rockhampton, Heron, Great Keppel and Quoin Islands, Yeppoon, Emu Park, Gladstone, Emerald and the Mount Morgan Mines.
